this post critiques the fact that while people claim to be concerned about data privacy, they often fail to take responsibility for protecting their own personal information. it highlights the irony of individuals calling for better data protection laws and regulations, yet still sharing their personal data carelessly on social media platforms or through other online activities. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphÃ¤re (private sphere), and #selbstverantwortung (self-responsibility) are used to reach a wider audience interested in these topics.
